analysis.description:
CryptoRides.purchase (/unique_chucks/12/0xe0a8a9b7c821d9bbd66b826129d4cf1b219ebb3a.sol#138-181) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/12/0xe0a8a9b7c821d9bbd66b826129d4cf1b219ebb3a.sol#170-172)

CryptoRides._payout (/unique_chucks/12/0xe0a8a9b7c821d9bbd66b826129d4cf1b219ebb3a.sol#286-291) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ceoAddress.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/12/0xe0a8a9b7c821d9bbd66b826129d4cf1b219ebb3a.sol#288-289)
	- _to.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/12/0xe0a8a9b7c821d9bbd66b826129d4cf1b219ebb3a.sol#289-291)
